title: Draft Pick/Chroma Packs
body: I noticed while playing one of my favorite Marksmen, Lucian, while loving the new draft pick, I realized, there is NO option for picking chroma packs! It makes me sad, because I love the Lucian chroma pack, but had NO option to pick it with the new draft pick. I hope this gets patched soon! Just bringing light to it!

replies.body:
Hey Skillet77,

Thanks for the report! This is a known issue with the new champion select. There's a similar issue with ward skin selection. This issue should be resolved next patch.
thats true. i have the pool party leona chroma pack but i cant choose what color i want with the new champ select methods. theres no option for this. riot pls fix
This is a known bug with the new champion select - you should see a fix for this next patch.
